# Meet Spectrum,
Adobe’s design system Spectrum provides components and tools to help product teams work more efficiently, and to make Adobe’s applications more cohesive. ![https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/spectrum_illustration_desktop@2x_6NmmXXCcRJFEA27mTCzU9V_1571022712000.png](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/spectrum_illustration_desktop@2x_6NmmXXCcRJFEA27mTCzU9V_1571022712000.png) ## Principles Get to know our foundational thinking and how we put it into action across our design system. [Learn about our principles](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/principles/) ## Resources Download resources to help you design faster and with more precision. [Download Adobe XD plugin](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/spectrum-xd-plugin/) [Download UI kits](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/ui-kits/) [Download fonts](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/fonts/) [Download icons](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/icons/) ## Implementations Use our open-source implementations, in partnership with the detailed usage guidelines here.

![rational](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_rational@2x_6JDH4xfAzPf61Ab262ROcB_1571091065056.png) ## Rational Spectrum is based on real-world situations. Every component, pattern, and principle is informed by research and thoughtful testing.


![human](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_human@2x_58wXNbhoPEzwqTuG7wGMoo_1571091080838.png) ## Human Spectrum places customer needs first. It's deeply committed to a high standard of accessibility, honesty, and respect for user attention.


![focused](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_focused@2x_5M4WfAj7wpz2h5rQ6kgSze_1571091092510.png) ## Focused Spectrum strives to deliver what’s needed, when it’s needed. No unnecessary decoration or irrelevant content.

Our principles in action
## For all platforms ![platforms](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_in-action_all-platforms@2x_4bxuVMMLNV2bH2OHPwAYkV_1568840929590.png) We believe that people should have a high quality experience that effortlessly scales across platforms. Spectrum considers all platforms — for both desktop and mobile — from the ground up. We recognize that people work across many different products and often need to context switch, so our scale system accounts for better legibility and easier UI interactions to set a foundation for consistent experiences across devices. [Learn about platform scale](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/platform-scale/) ## For everyone ![for-everyone](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_in-action_for-everyone@2x_4cq4MJtcYQoXpB7evUNtMZ_1568840942209.png) We believe in building for the widest audience possible. Spectrum is designed to be clearly readable, intuitive to use, and mindful of those who require alternative input peripherals or screen readers. Everything in our system — from color and type to interaction and language — is built to be compliant with industry standards. [Learn about inclusive design](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/inclusive-design/) [Learn about international design](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/international-design/) [Learn about bi-directionality](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/bi-directionality/) ## Evolving and transparent ![evolving](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_in-action_evolving-transparent@2x_2fUqE2qPqwgE1dJJX88HvE_1568840950943.png) We believe in a system that’s visible, flexible, and evolves. Spectrum is built with transparency at its core. Everything in our system has its own individual versioning, a list of open issues, and a design checklist that communicate overall status. We want to consistently communicate what we’re working on, set clear expectations, and build trust with our users so that we can strengthen the relationships that help products and industries grow. [Check out what’s new](https://spectrum.adobe.com/page/whats-new/) ## Built by a community ![community](https://spectrum.adobe.com/static/images1x/principles_in-action_community@2x_AdX2rvgOGaCLcRl6Q2je5_1568840961046.png) We believe that our system gets its strength from everyone. Spectrum connects many different talents, viewpoints, and skills into something that benefits all Adobe products. Anyone at Adobe can contribute to a collection of design elements that are being considered as additions to the design system.
